ALBEIT.Definition: used to reduce the importance of what was just said

CAVE.Definition: give up, finally change your mind

DRUM UP.Definition: get support or attention for something

ECCENTRIC.Definition: behaving in a way that is unusual

EXERT.Definition: to use your power or strength in order to make something else happen

EXERTS.Definition: to use your power or strength in order to make something else happen

EXTORTION.Definition: getting money from someone by threatening them

HYPERLOCAL.Definition: on a very small local level

IMPLICATED.Definition: suggested that someone took part in a crime

INFILTRATE.Definition: to become part of something (often in a secret way)

LOOKOUTS.Definition: a person who looks out for other criminals or the police

OSTENTATIOUS.Definition: like showing off, likes showing how rich they are

PARANOID.Definition: believing that you cannot trust other people

RUTHLESS.Definition: determined to do something and not afraid to hurt others in the process

SAFEHOUSE.Definition: a house that someone would go to to avoid being found

SOCIAL MEDIA SAVVY.Definition: know how to use social media

SUPERGRASSES.Definition: a criminal who gives information to the police in order to have a reduced sentence

TAPPING.Definition: secretly listening to a phone line

UNIFICATION.Definition: combining two or more things to create one thing, e.g. a country

WARRANT.Definition: an official document (e.g. for an arrest)

WHOLESALE.Definition: in large volumes and low prices
